org.elasticsearch.script.groovy

Class GroovyScriptEngineService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.common.component.AbstractComponent
      • org.elasticsearch.script.groovy.GroovyScriptEngineService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, ScriptEngineService

    public class GroovyScriptEngineService
extends AbstractComponent
implements ScriptEngineService
    Provides the infrastructure for Groovy as a scripting language for Elasticsearch
